item.title: Contact Us
item.description: The best way to contact folks in the community is by using github discussions

item.title: Contribute some Code
item.description: Without the community contributing code we have nothing, take a look at our github organisation and see if there is a project to contribute to.

item.title: Follow us on Twitter
item.description: To keep up to date with all the ArtemisCloud release and any other important news follow us at https://twitter.com/artemiscloudio

item.title: Improve the Website
item.description: You can contribute to this website by forking artemiscloud.github.io and raising a PR. Feel free to add a blog post, provide content or documentation.

item.title: Report Bugs
item.description: If you come across any bugs or have ideas for improvments then you can raise a github issue on the project, for instance https://github.com/artemiscloud/activemq-artemis-operator/issues

item.title: Transition to arkmq.org
item.description: Starting January 1, 2025, the new domain name will be arkmq.org. The transition will affect the following resources: the website, the GitHub repositories, the container registries and the X account. The old resources will become read-only and the new resources will be created: Resource Old New Website https://artemiscloud.io/ https://arkmq.org/ GitHub repositories https://github.com/orgs/artemiscloud/repositories https://github.com/orgs/arkmq-org/repositories Container registries https://quay.io/organization/artemiscloud https://quay.io/organization/arkmq-org This decision has been made to avoid ambiguity between Artemiscloud.
